duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and ship (load and unload) merchandise while observing all guidelines set forth by the Company to limit shrink.
Stage Showroom and/or Outlet in preparation to receive merchandise in accordance with Visual merchandising guidelines.
Assemble merchandise with care, working conscientiously to limit damage.
Coordinate and prepare unsold merchandise for shipping.
Expedite customer product pickups according to Company guidelines.
Actively assist in conducting Inventory as required.
Exhibit excellent Customer service with all interactions.
Observe and maintain safety requirements of the organization.
Contribute to and maintain a clean back-end (warehouse / stock room) and Showroom working environment.
Assist with Café duties as directed.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
